Name: Baby Blue Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Easy drinking, fruity gin. Depending on your blue curaçao and juices, this cocktail may end up more aquamarine than baby blue.
Nutrition: One serving of Baby Blue Cocktail contains 152 calories
